title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 7. Schedule 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph 1, by
text_raw:
7. Schedule 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended, in paragraph 1, by 

the substitution of the following subparagraph for subparagraph (b): 

“(b) The risk management policy shall comprise such procedures as 
are necessary to enable the management company to assess for 
each UCITS it manages the exposure of that UCITS to market, 
liquidity, sustainability and counterparty risks, and the exposure 
of the UCITS to all other risks, including operational risks, 
which may be material for each UCITS it manages.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 September, 2022. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance.
